Calculate dispersion

Source: R/calculate_dispersion.R
calculate_dispersion.Rd

Function to calculate dispersion of settled points

Usage

calculate_dispersion(input)

Arguments

input

sf POINTS file (defaults to NULL)

Details

dispersion = standard deviation of distances from each point to centroid of all points
